participant_1.background:
I remember listening to Marduk with my friends in the basement.
I am a stay at home mom because my depression and anxiety makes it difficult for me to work outside the home.
I went to a concert and danced my heart out.
i make my own clothes.
i drive a truck for a living.

participant_2.background:
My first cup of coffee in the morning inspires me to write and create content for my blog.
Leaving my father behind when I immigrated to the United States.
I enjoy creating beautiful wedding cakes for people to enjoy on their special day.
i love wearing flip flops.
I travel to the mountains and enjoy my free time.

content.text: Hello!
Hi there! What brings you to chat today?
I wanted to talk about music. What kind of music are you into?
I like a variety of music, but I mostly listen to rock and metal.
Me too! I love Marduk. They're my favorite band.
I've never heard of them. What kind of music do they play?
They're a black metal band from Sweden. Their music is really dark and heavy.
That sounds interesting. I'll have to check them out.
You should! They're one of the best black metal bands out there.
I'm also really into wedding cakes. I love making them and seeing how happy they make people.
That's awesome! I'm sure you make beautiful cakes.
Thanks! I try my best.
What's your favorite part about making wedding cakes?
I love seeing the bride and groom's faces when they see their cake for the first time. It's so much fun to be a part of their special day.
That sounds really rewarding.
It is! It's one of the reasons I love my job so much.
I'm glad you enjoy your job. It sounds like you're really good at it.
Thanks! I try my best.
Well, it sounds like you're a pretty interesting person. I'm glad I met you!
Thanks! You too
